review.author: Frontend (Agent Teams)
review.findings: CSS perf items 4-6: (4) Added 7 will-change hints on state-gated selectors only — verified none on always-idle elements. (5) Moved pane-spinner breathe animation from base to state-gated selector — no regression. (6) Removed dead terminals-section margin-right transition (both states were 0). Kept right-panel width transition (flex layout requires real width change). 91 suites / 2917 tests passing.

_docs.rule: If change_type !== 'routine', reviewer model MUST differ from author model
_docs.workflow: 1. Author fills author+author_model+change_type. 2. Reviewer fills reviewer+model+result+findings. 3. Pre-commit checks result=approved and cross-model rule. 4. After commit, review.json is reset to pending.
